alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Orange; Seminole; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 24 at 3:30AM EST until December 24 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, duration of freezing temperatures early this morning 2 to 4 hours. For the second Freeze Warning tonight, duration of freezing temperatures between 2 and 6 hours expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 32 possible. * WHERE...Orange, Seminole, Coastal Volusia and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Bring pets and potted plants indoors. Check on elderly neighbors to make sure their furnace is working.To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they can be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Orange; Seminole; Southern Lake County
